code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import BookCard from'./BookCard';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ShowBooks=()=>{const[books,setBooks]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{axios.get("https://react-kr.vercel.app/books").then(response=>{setBooks(response.data.books);}).catch(error=>{console.log(error);});},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"book-list",children:books.map(book=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BookCard,{link:"/books/details/".concat(book._id),name:book.name,author:book.author,image:book.image}))});};export default ShowBooks;
